trans-unit.source: Specifies the Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) action to be taken in rendering a given <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a ação de reconhecimento de voz Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) para ser executada numa composição de um determinado <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: TtsEngineAction represents requests for servicing a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: TtsEngineAction representa pedidos para a manutenção <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: The actions correspond closely to elements in the SSML specification and are implemented on the text returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: As ações estritamente correspondem a elementos na especificação de SSML e são implementadas no texto devolvido pela <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TtsEngineAction value associated with a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor de TtsEngineAction associado um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>é devolvido pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: Processing of the TtsEngineAction value returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property is handled by a speech synthesizes implementation of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method on a class derived from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.
trans-unit.target: Processamento do valor TtsEngineAction devolvido pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>propriedade é processada por uma voz synthesizes implementação do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>método de uma classe derivada de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> is to be used as the contents of a bookmark.
trans-unit.target: Indica que <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> está a ser utilizado como o conteúdo de um marcador.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<mark>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corresponde do `<mark>` tag XML na especificação SSML.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no action has been determined from SSML input.
trans-unit.target: Indica que não foi considerada nenhuma ação de entrada SSML.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is an unknown XML tag not part of the SSML standard.
trans-unit.target: Associada <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>é uma tag XML desconhecida não faz parte de padrão SSML.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: This input that may be interpreted or ignored by at the discretion of a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Esta entrada do que pode ser interpretada ou ignorada pelo critério de um motor de synthesis.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Requests that input <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> text be interpreted as phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Pedidos de entrada <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> texto ser interpretado como fonemas.

trans-unit.source: Exact pronunciation is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Pronunciação exata é especificada pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>Membro o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>objecto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>propriedade no <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>instâncias.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Phoneme>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corresponde do `<Phoneme>` tag XML na especificação SSML.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> contains no text to be rendered as speech.
trans-unit.target: Indica que um <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> contém sem texto a ser composto como reconhecimento de voz.

trans-unit.source: Duration of the silence is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A> member of the he <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Duração de silêncio é especificada pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>Membro o putador <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>objecto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>instâncias.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Silence>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corresponde do `<Silence>` tag XML na especificação SSML.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the associated <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> should be processed and spoken.
trans-unit.target: Os pedidos que associada <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> deve ser processado e autenticação ditas.

trans-unit.source: This is the default value of TtsEngineAction for a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, Corresponds to the `<speak>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Este é o valor predefinido de TtsEngineAction para um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, corresponde do `<speak>` tag XML na especificação SSML</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that text values provided by a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> through its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*> property are to be synthesize as individual characters.
trans-unit.target: Indica que os valores de texto fornecidos por um <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> através do respetivo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*>propriedade são para sintetizar como carateres individuais.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*>

trans-unit.source: This rendering includes punctuation, other than white space, as well as alphanumeric text.
trans-unit.target: Este composição inclui pontuação, que não seja um espaço em branco, bem como texto alfanumérico.

trans-unit.source: For example thee associated text fragment "word!"
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo associados thee fragmento de texto "word!"

trans-unit.source: should be synthsized into "w o r d exclamation point".
trans-unit.target: deve ser synthsized para "w o r ponto de exclamação d".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Indicates state of paragraph.
trans-unit.target: Indica o estado de parágrafo.

trans-unit.source:
Corresponds to the `

` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target:
Corresponde do `

` tag XML na especificação SSML

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Indicates start of sentence.
trans-unit.target: Indica o início de frases.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<s>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Corresponde do `<s>` tag XML na especificação SSML

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
